        Generate CREATE INDEX SQL statement for given params.
        Parameters:
        fullTblName - Fully qualified table name.
        h2Idx - H2 index.
        ifNotExists - Quietly skip index creation if it exists.

        Statement string.

        Parameters:

        ifExists - Quietly skip index drop if it exists.
        Returns:
        Statement string.
